data.caption: Notice Of The 55 Annual General Meeting
data.news_body: The 55th Annual General Meeting of the Company is scheduled to be held on the Monday 21st August 2023 at 11:00 AM IST through video conference/ Other audio visual means. The Notice and explanatory statement are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Quick Results For The Meeting Held On 28 July 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at their meeting held on 28 July 2023 have approved the Un-Audited Results for the quarter ended 30 June 2023.

A copy of the Un-Audited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report is enclosed.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12:15 PM and concluded at 12:45 PM.

data.caption: Quick Results For The Meeting Held On 28 July 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at their meeting held on 28 July 2023 have approved the Un-Audited Results for the quarter ended 30 June 2023.

A copy of the Un-Audited Financial Results along with Limited Review Report is enclosed.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12:15 PM and concluded at 12:45 PM.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 28 July 2023
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their 260th Meeting held on 28th July 2023 have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th June 2023 and authorized to publish the same.A copy of the Un-Audited Financial Results with Limited Review Report issued by the Statutory Auditors is enclosed.The Board Meeting commenced at 12:15 PM and concluded at 12:45 PM. This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Quick Results For Quarter Ended 30 June 2023
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at their 260th Meeting have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th June 2023 and authorize to publish the same.

A copy of Un- Audited Financial Results with Limited Review Report issued by Statutory Auditors is enclosed.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12:15 PM and concluded at 12:45 PM

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31St March 2023
data.news_body: In Compliance with Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the details on Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 31st March, 2023, prepared in accordance with the format specified by SEBI vide circular SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Financial Year Ended 31.03.2023
data.news_body: Board approved the audited financial results for the 4th quarter and financial year ended 31.03.2023.

data.caption: Quick Results As On 31/03/2023
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in their 259th Meeting held on 27th May 2023 has resolved as follows:Approved the Audited Financial Statements for the Quarter and Financial Year ended 31st March 2023 and to publish the same.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the third quarter and period ended 31st December, 2022 at their 258th Meeting held on 13th February, 2023.

The same are enclosed along with the Limited Review Report as on that date issued by the G. Nagendrasundaram & Co., Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12:40 PM and concluded at 1:10 PM.
This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For Half Year Ended 30Th September 2022
data.news_body: In continuation to our earlier submission we are herewith submitting the Statement of Related Party Transactions as there was a typo error in our previous submission. The statement is prepared in accordance with the format specified by SEBI vide circular SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021. This is for your information and records.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 30Th September 2022
data.news_body: In Compliance with Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the details on Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 30th September, 2022, prepared in accordance with the format specified by SEBI vide circular SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021. This is for your information and records.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the second quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 at their 257th meeting held on 10th November, 2022.

The same are enclosed along with the Limited Review Report as on that date issued by the G. Nagendrasundaram & Co., Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The Board have also appointed Mr. Y.V. Prashanth as an Additional Director and Executive Director with immediate effect.
This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30/06/2022
data.news_body: We enclose hear with the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30th June 2022.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31St March 2022
data.news_body: In Compliance with Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the details on Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 31st March, 2022, prepared in accordance with the format specified by SEBI vide circular SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021. This is for your information and records.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors at their 255th Meeting held on 24th May 2022 has resolved as follows:

i. Approved the Audited Financial Statements for the Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2022 and to publish the same.

ii. Recommended Equity Dividend of Rs 2 per share of Rs 10 paid up for the Financial Year ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the third quarter ended 31st December, 2021 at their 254th meeting held on 8th February, 2022.

The same are enclosed along with the Limited Review Report as on that date issued by the G. Nagendrasundaram & Co., Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body: We are herewith attaching a statement of related party transactions for the half year ended 30th September 2021.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Out Come Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: The Board of Directors have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the second quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021 at their 253rd meeting held on Saturday the October 30, 2021.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their 252nd Meeting held on Wednesday the August 4, 2021 have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the first quarter ended as on 30th June 2021.
The same are enclosed along with the Limited Review Report issued by the G. Nagendrasundaram & Co., Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their 252nd Meeting held on August 4, 2021 have approved the Un-Audited Financial Results for the first quarter ended June 30, 2021.

The same are enclosed along with the Limited Review Report issued by the G. Nagendrasundaram & Co., Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the Company.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: With reference to the subject cited above we are herewith enclosing a statement of related party transactions for the half year ended 31st March 2021.

data.caption: Update On Results
data.news_body: Update on Financial Results of 2021

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their 251st Meeting held on 10th June 2021 has resolved as follows:

i. Approved the Audited Financial Statements for the Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2021 and to publish the same.

ii. Recommended Equity Dividend of Rs 0.80 per share of Rs 10 paid up for the Financial Year ended 31st March 2021.

A copy of the Audited Financial Results with Independent Auditors Report and declaration with unmodified opinion on the Audited Financial Results are enclosed.

This is for your information and record.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors in their 251st Meeting held on 10th June 2021 has resolved as follows:

i. Approved the Audited Financial Statements for the Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2021 and to publish the same.

ii. Recommended Equity Dividend of Rs 0.80 per share of Rs 10 paid up for the Financial Year ended 31st March 2021.

A copy of the Audited Financial Results with Independent Auditors Report and declaration with unmodified opinion on the Audited Financial Results are enclosed.
